name: Can View members
precondition:
Important

Ensure that `Allow users to view archived channels` is enabled on the server and some public and private archived channels exist
(Setting can be found in System Console under "Users and Teams")

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Can View members
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open an archived channel
  2. Click the channel header
  3. Select "View Members"
    Note: The same menu choice reads "Manage Members" on non-archived channels
  4. Ensure there are no options to change channel roles or membership
inline.expectedResult:
• Channel Members RHS opens
  • Membership or role cannot be changed

customFields.Related ticket(s): REGRESSION: Webapp & Desktop App - "View/Manage Members" option no longer visible in channel drop-down menu for Archived channels — MM-15062
